title: How to Make Western Skillet Rice

steps.headline: Add ground chuck to skillet and brown the meat.
Cook the peas in a separate pot.
Turn heat to medium and add the soup mix, water, rice, tomatoes and pepper.
Cover with and lid and turn heat to low.
Add the cooked peas after the mixture has cooked 25 minutes.

text: Add ground chuck to skillet and brown the meat.  Cook the peas in a separate pot.  Turn heat to medium and add the soup mix, water, rice, tomatoes and pepper.  Bring to a boil.  Cover with and lid and turn heat to low.  Simmer 25 minutes.  Add the cooked peas after the mixture has cooked 25 minutes.  Heat through.  Top with shredded cheese.  Finished.
